item.title: Corporate social responsibility
item.description:
EveryCheck’s commitment

Corporate social responsiblity represents the commitments from companies around sustainable environmental, social and economic development.

A CSR reporting is mandatory for 500+ employees companies, but EveryCheck chose to engage on 5 core ethical values :

  1. Always bring more confidence to our clients
  • Aim for a client satisfaction rate higher than 80%
  • Facilitate cross cooperation between our teams and customers through regular meetings
  • Set up control points
  1. Manage ethically personal data
  • All collaborators are trained to ethical personal data management
  • We have a trained DPO among our collaborators, who holds a degree from UTT
  • EveryCheck has a transparent data security policy
  1. Care for the well being of our team
  • EveryCheck’s core values are: strong determination, positive attitude et solidarity
  • Social moments to strengthen bounds between collaborators
  • The company fosters collaborators propositions and communication
  1. Develop our solidarity commitment
  • Skills patronage and partnerships with schools about CV creation
  1. Reduce our environmental impact
  • Waste management
  • Sustainable supply
  • Reduction of energy use

item.title: GDPR and respect of personnal data
item.description:
Thanks to a simple, efficient platform, you can manage all aspects of your audits: track the progress of the process, access detailed audit trails and consult summary reports on individual candidates.

No verification begins without the clear and explicit consent of the data owner. The data collected and used, the purposes for which it is processed, and the processing itself are all explained upstream.

A transparent process

Applicants can exercise their right to have their personal data deleted or withdraw their consent at any time. At the end of the agreed retention period, the personal data held by EveryCheck is anonymized.
